svcproc.title: Radiator Shutter With Cummins M11E And N14E
svcproc.para: The function of radiator shutters is to keep the operating temperature of the engine in the optimum temperature range. This system utilizes an engine temperature sensor which causes the shutters to open when operating temperature reaches 82.2°C (180°F) or close at 78.3°C (173°F).
The system also includes an air intake temperature switch. Either switch can control the shutters.
